author: Matt S
title: Gorgeous place in gorgeous surroundings
text:
Beautiful hotel set in the heart of Mayfair. The inside is every bit as lovely as the outside, with a stunning staircase leading upstairs.
We stayed for one night and wish we could have stayed longer. If you want a special experience you will remember, then look no further. The rooms are stunning, and a simple description here does not do it justice. You need to see them!!
The staff are lovely, very friendly and helpful and nothing is too much trouble for them.
If you have time, try out the Champagne Bar, the selection they have is amazing and the ambience is just gorgeous.
Be advised though that they operate a smart casual dress code so don't turn up in shorts and t shirt and expect to be let in! But if you're going to a hotel like this then you should be dressed appropriately anyway!
We absolutely loved it there and will be back next time we're down in London. Thank you to all the staff who made our stay one of the best we've ever had!
